title: Environ Data Analysis
description: Data Analysis methods used in environmental research are taught through examples.  Students learn to implement these methods to areas of their own interests.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (CS 1301 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CS 1371 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and (MATH 2551 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2561 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
